subject: Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Three North Carolina underclassmen — Harrison Barnes, John Henson and Kendall Marshall — will enter the N.B.A. draft, the university said Thursday.
snippet: Three North Carolina underclassmen — Harrison Barnes, John Henson and Kendall Marshall — will enter the N.B.A. draft, the university said Thursday.
